body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

spack install julia@1.7.1


### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.17.1-1070-5208fcf
* **Python:** 3.8.12
* **Platform:** linux-rhel6-broadwell
* **Concretizer:** clingo


### Additional information

[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7996663/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7996664/spack-build-out.txt)

spack install libuv@1.42.0 works fine, but I encounter the problem when I build libuv under julia@1.7.1


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: libuv 1.42.0
